value:
$WmMPID_ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Ah, there you are—the siblings
that everyone keeps talking
about.$k$pWell, the winner in this battle of
sibling supremacy is clear.$k$pMy dear brother, Eldigan, has
already won the day by virtue of
his good looks alone.$k$pHe sets the standard for older
brothers. Yes, I say! Raise high
the banner for Eldigan!$k$pStill, let's settle this matter once
and for all.$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Normal,Face|$w0|We lost? And yet losing...has never
felt like such a relief.$k$pI feel like a strange weight has
lifted from my shoulders.$k$pJust being here with my brother
is all I could ever want.$k$pI dearly hope you feel the same.
Siblings—forever. How the thought
brightens my day.$k$p$WmMPID_エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Normal,Face|You have all shown your strength.
And so I lower my sword—a bitter
moment for any true knight.$k$pDuty is my code, so though you
have broken the contract that
binds us...$k$pI find it as disheartening as losing
a liege. What am I to do with
myself now?$k$p$WmMPID_ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Eldie... Let us return to our home.
After all, you once promised to
return to our castle one day.$k$p$WmMPID_エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Normal,Face|Heh. I suppose I did. So, perhaps
that will be my next destination.$k$pTravelers, you have my thanks.
Next we meet, I hope to raise my
sword in service to you.$k$Sbs150|
